name: Transformed Into A Piece Of Land
author: Qi Le Comics Studio
content: The darkness eclipses, humans began to transform into unique monsters&#40Darksiders&#41, but I got transformed into a piece of land! I live together with the other humans that managed to survived, planting crops and building walls to resist the monsters and the darkness of human nature, preserving the last spark of humanityâ€™s fate during this apocalypse.
